A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The cat, left to fend for itself when its owners move away, has taken to killing the local livestock, and is ultimately threatened with extermination.
Consternation spreads when a policeman is killed and it is suspected that a cat is responsible. The cat is, in fact, a demonic force of evil,
